about_me:
Hello my name is Toni Peraira! I am a Full-Stack developer passionate about learning new things. I love learning new technologies and be up to date about what's new in the world of development and cibersecurity.

One of the things I like the most about programming is that it allows me to find solutions for everything, that's why I'm a big fan of scripting. If I have to do anything, I'm sure it can be automated with a script.
